00020     //       of the physics subsystem.

00022 
00023     Real m_maxHealth;
00024 
00025     Real m_health;
00026 
00027     Real m_maxEnergy;
00028 
00029     Real m_energy;
00030 
00031     // Note: Not implemented in this class, should be used in subclasses
00032     // implementation of updatePhysics
00033     Real m_energyRechargeRate;
00034 public: 
00035     GameObject(const SphereCollisionObject& object, Real maxHealth, 
00036         Real maxEnergy, Real energyRechargeRate);
00037 
00038     GameObject(const GameObject& copy);
00039     ~GameObject();
00040 
00041     /** @return The collision object which encapsulates all physics data for this object */
00042     SphereCollisionObject * phys() const;
00043 
00044     ObjectType type() const;
00045 
00046     Real health() const;

00048     Real energy() const;

00050     Real energyRecharge() const;
00051 
00052     virtual void updatePhysics(Real timeElapsed) = 0;
00053     void health(Real health);
00054     void energy(Real energy);
00055

00076 class Weapon
00077 {
00078 private:
00079     /** The time which should elapse between projectile generations */
00080     Real m_reloadTime;
00081 
00082     /** The time which has elapsed since the last projectile generation */
00083     Real m_lastShotCounter;
00084 
00085     /** Flag determining if the ship's weapons are currently loaded */
00086     bool m_canShoot;
00087 
00088     Real m_energyCost;
00089 
00090 public:
00091     /** Generates a new (loaded) weapon with the specified reload time */
00092     Weapon(Real reloadTime, Real m_energyCost);
00093 
00094     Weapon(const Weapon& copy);
00095     
00096     virtual ~Weapon();
00097 
00098     /** @return True if the weapon is loaded (reload time has expired since last shot) */
00099     bool canShoot() const;
00100 
00101     void resetShotCounter();
00102 
00103     Real energyCost();
00104 
00105     /** Generates a projectile PhysicsObject, and resets the weapons's reload counter*/
00106     virtual Projectile fireWeapon(PhysicsObject& origin) = 0;
00107 
00108     void updatePhysics(Real timeElapsed);
00109 };

00138 /**
00139  * Represents a human or NPC controllable space ship which
00140  * can generate projectiles.
00141  */
00142 class SpaceShip : public GameObject
00143 {
00144 private:
00145     /** A list of all weapons currently equipped on the ship */
00146     std::vector<Weapon *> mp_weapons;
00147 
00148 public:
00149     /** Construct a SpaceShip with the specified mass and size at the specified position */
00150     SpaceShip(ObjectType type, Real mass, Vector3 position, Real energyRecharge);
00151 
00152     /** Construct a SpaceShip with the specified mass and size at the specified position */
00153     SpaceShip(ObjectType type, Real mass, Vector3 position);
00154 
00155     /** Construct a SpaceShip with the specified mass and size at the origin */
00156     SpaceShip(ObjectType type, Real mass);
00157 
00158     /** Copy constructor */
00159     SpaceShip(const SpaceShip& copy);
00160 
00161     PlasmaCannon * addPlasmaCannon(const PlasmaCannon& weapon);
00162 
00163     AnchorLauncher * addAnchorLauncher(const AnchorLauncher& weapon);
00164 
00165     Projectile * fireWeapon(GameArena& arena, int weaponIndex);
00166 
00167     /** Updates the ship's position and reload status */
00168     void updatePhysics(Real timeElapsed);
00169 };

00171 /**
00172  * Interface for listening on a GameArena instance.
00173  * This interface should be extended by classes which are interested in being notified
00174  * whenever an object is added to or removed from the game arena
00175  */
00176 class GameArenaListener
00177 {
00178 public:
00179     /** Called whenever a new GameObject is generated in the GameArena */
00180     virtual void newGameObject(GameObject * object) = 0;
00181 
00182     /** Called just before a GameObject is destroyed in the GameArena */
00183     virtual void destroyedGameObject(GameObject * object) = 0;
00184 
00185     /** Called whenever a new Constraint is generated in the GameArena */
00186     virtual void newConstraint(Constraint * object) = 0;
00187 
00188     /** Called just before a Constraint is destroyed in the GameArena */
00189     virtual void destroyedConstraint(Constraint * object) = 0;
00190 };
00191 
00192 /**
00193  * GameArena represents a cube of space in which ships, projectiles, and other
00194  * objects should undergo physics simulation. The GameArena is responsible for
00195  * storing references to all involved PhysicsObjects, and notifying listeners
00196  * when new objects are created and destroyed.
00197  */
00198 class GameArena
00199 {
00200 private:
00201     /**
00202      * The size of the game arena.
00203      * Arenas are a cube centered on the origin, and each wall
00204      * is m_arenaSize units from the center (i.e. each wall of the cube
00205      * is 2 * m_arenaSize long).
00206      */
00207     Real m_arenaSize;
00208 
00209     SpaceShip * m_playerShip;
00210 
00211     /** A vector of pointers to dynamically allocated memory for all npc ships in the GameArena */
00212     std::vector<SpaceShip *> m_npcShips;
00213 
00214     /** A vector of pointers to dynamically allocated memory for all projectiles in the GameArena */
00215     std::vector<Projectile *> m_projectiles;
00216 
00217     /** A vector of pointers to dynamically allocated memory for all projectiles in the GameArena */
00218     std::vector<Constraint *> m_constraints;
00219 
00220     /** A vector of pointers to GameArenaListener instances registered with the GameArena*/
00221     std::vector<GameArenaListener *> m_listeners;
00222 
00223     void notifyObjectCreation(GameObject * object);
00224     void notifyObjectDestruction(GameObject * object);
00225     void notifyConstraintCreation(Constraint * object);
00226     void notifyConstraintDestruction(Constraint * object);
00227 public:
00228     /** Constructs a new, empty GameArena with the specified size. */
00229     GameArena(Real size);
00230 
00231     /** Registers a GameArenaListener with the GameArena */
00232     void addGameArenaListener(GameArenaListener * listener);
00233 
00234     /** Unregisters a GameArenaListener from the GameArena */
00235     void removeGameArenaListener(GameArenaListener * listener);
00236 
00237     Real size() const;
00238 
00239     /**
00240      * Adds a SpaceShip to the GameArena.
00241      * Note: A copy of the passed SpaceShip is created and stored in dynamic memory.
00242      * @return  A pointer to the new copy of the SpaceShip. This pointer will remain valuid
00243      *          for the lifetime of the GameArena.
00244      */
00245     SpaceShip * setPlayerShip(const SpaceShip& ship);
00246 
00247     Constraint * addConstraint(const Constraint& constraint);
00248 
00249     std::vector<Constraint * >::iterator destroyConstraint(Constraint * constraint);
00250 
00251     SpaceShip * addNpcShip(const SpaceShip& ship);
00252 
00253     /**
00254      * Adds a projectile to the GameArena.
00255      * Note: A copy of the passed PhysicsObject is created and stored in dynamic memory.
00256      * @return  A pointer to the new copy of the PhysicsObject. This pointer will remain valuid
00257      *          for the lifetime of the GameArena.
00258      */
00259     Projectile * addProjectile(const Projectile& projectile);
00260 
00261     /** Destroys a projectile, erasing it from the vector of stored PhysicsObjects */
00262     std::vector<Projectile * >::iterator destroyProjectile(Projectile * projectile);
00263 
00264     std::vector<SpaceShip * >::iterator destroyNpcShip(SpaceShip * npcShip);
00265 
00266     /** @return A pointer to the player's ship */
00267     SpaceShip * playerShip();
00268 
00269     /** @return The list of pointers to all active projectiles */
00270     std::vector<Projectile *> * projectiles();
00271 
00272     /** @return The list of pointers to all active ships */
00273     std::vector<SpaceShip *> * npcShips();
00274 
00275     /** 
00276      * @return A pointer to the PhysicsObject produced by generating a projectile from the passed ship 
00277      * and stored in dynamic memory.
00278      */
00279     Projectile * fireProjectileFromShip(SpaceShip * ship, int weaponIndex);
00280 
00281     /** Updates the physics of all ships and projectiles in the arena */
00282     void updatePhysics(Real timeElapsed);
00283 };
